title: Paadhi Kadhal Lyrics Modhi Vilayadu Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Movie: Modhi Vilayadu
Music: Colonial Cousins
Singer: Sunitha Sarathy, Bombay Jayashree

Paadhi kadhal paadhi mutham podhathu podathu poda
oh meedhi mutham kettu kettu melaadai thee mootum vaada
en penmai eriyuthada

Paadhi kadhal paadhi mutham podhathu podathu poda
oh meedhi mutham kettu kettu meladai thee mootum vaada
en penmai eriyuthada

udhattil eri mooti uyir uruga seidha manmadha
uchacham varum pozhudu unnai udhari kolvadha

mosamana kanavu ondru meendum meendum meendum thondrum
oh naan aanin dhegam aavadhaga vetka kanavu vellai kodu thaandum
yen vayadhu valikkuthada

parakkum mutham koduthu ennai parakka sollum manmadha
virumbi unai azaikha pasi vilagi selvadha

kadhal ennai kadhal seyya padhukappu valayam thalarthinen
poonai pola ulle vandha paanai irukkum thisayai kaatinen
bayanthu konde idhazh kulithaai
paadhiyile vittu paai mel sendrai (?)

mosamana kanavu ondru meendum meendum meendum thondrum
oh thondrum oh o ho

roja poovin vaasam ellam endha udhadil adhigam ulladho ho
penmai-k-kaana inbam ellam endhan udalil engu ulladho
vaathsaayanam padhithavane
vaari koduthaal sorgam kanben naane

Paadhi kadhal paadhi mutham podhathu podathu poda
oh meedhi mutham kettu kettu melaadai thee mootum vaada
en penmai eriyuthada

udhattil eri mooti uyir uruga seidha manmadha
uchacham varum pozhudu unnai udhari kolvadha
